title: Channel24.co.za | Win tickets to go watch a zombie flick with us!
text:
Win tickets to go watch a zombie flick with us! 2015-10-22 05:00 The cast in a scene from Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse. (Universal Pictures) Related Links 
Cape Town - Channel24 movie fans stand the chance of winning tickets to go watch the new flick, Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse first! 
Scroll down for more information on how to enter and to find out if the screenings are taking place at a cinema near you. 
But first some more information about the movie. 
The plot: 
Three scouts and lifelong friends join forces with one badass cocktail waitress to become the world’s most unlikely team of heroes. When their peaceful town is ravaged by a zombie invasion, they’ll fight for the badge of a lifetime and put their scouting skills to the test to save mankind from the undead. 
The film stars Patrick Schwarzenegger, Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller, Joey Morgan, Sarah Dumont and Halston Sage. 
Watch the trailer here: 
<br _moz_dirty="" /> 
How to enter: 
There will be three screenings. One in Cape Town, one in Jozi and one in Durban. Seats are limited. The first 20 people from Jozi, 20 people from Durban and 10 people from Cape Town to enter will each win 2 tickets. 
Cape Town: 
The screening will take place at the Labia on 27 October at 17:15. 
To enter email the word ZOMBIES followed by CT and YOUR FULL NAME and contact details to movies@channel24.co.za 
Jozi: 
The screening will take place at The Zone Rosebank Cine 4 on 29 October at 20:00. 
To enter email the word ZOMBIES followed by JHB and YOUR FULL NAME and contact details to movies@channel24.co.za 
Durban: 
The screening will take place at Sun Coast Cinemas on 5 November at 20:00. 
To enter email the word ZOMBIES followed by DBN and YOUR FULL NAME and contact details to movies@channel24.co.za 
Please note: 
Entries close 23 October at 17:00. The winners will receive an email that confirms you’ve won. 
Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse will be released in South Africa on 6 November.
